Name: Pilli Adventure
About the game: Influenced by retro classics Mega Man and Castlevania, Pilli Adventure features the Pilli & Paco as they blast their way through 7 levels of fun, fast paced 2D action based on the Pilli Adventure online comic. Some say 'hard' we're saying 'rewarding!' Why? Because every check point you get, every boss you beat, every accomplishment is earned. You feel like like a superman. This is a game that allows you to brag to your friends if you beat it. Yes, this is the official Pilli Adventure game! Visit Pilli Adventure to read the comic the game was based on! Feel free to post gameplay, Let's Play, review etc , just let me know.
